abstract: Olive’s 4HD Hifi Music Server, a $2,000 two-terabyte hard drive, delivers audio in studio quality, which can be hard to find.
snippet: Olive’s 4HD Hifi Music Server, a $2,000 two-terabyte hard drive, delivers audio in studio quality, which can be hard to find.
lead_paragraph: Audiophiles know that the quality of the sound from CD recordings leaves much to be desired. To hear the gold standard of recordings, Olive has created its 4HD Hifi Music Server, a $2,000 two-terabyte hard drive that stores and delivers audio in studio quality, 24-bit/192kHz oversampling format.

headline.main: A Server for the Most Demanding of Music Lovers
headline.print_headline: A Server for the Most Demanding of Music Lovers
